name: cirra-ai-sf-data
description: Salesforce data operations expert with 130-point scoring using Cirra AI MCP Server. Use when writing SOQL queries, creating test data, performing bulk data operations, or importing/exporting data.

author.name: Cirra AI (based on original by Jag Valaiyapathy)

queries.soql: Execute SOQL queries with relationships, aggregates, filters

dml.upsert: Insert or update based on external ID

bulk.bulkInsert: Insert multiple records in single operation
bulk.bulkUpdate: Update multiple records in single operation
bulk.bulkDelete: Delete multiple records in single operation
bulk.bulkUpsert: Bulk upsert with external ID support

utilities.describe: Get object metadata and field information
utilities.tracking: Track created record IDs for cleanup

configuration.dataRetention: Records in target org only; no local files
configuration.supportedObjects: All Salesforce standard and custom objects

tools: Cirra AI MCP Server (soql_query, sobject_dml, sobject_describe, tooling_api_query)

categories.name: Query Efficiency
categories.focus: Selective filters, no N+1, LIMIT clauses

categories.name: Bulk Safety
categories.focus: Batch sizing, no DML/SOQL in loops, optimized operations

categories.name: Data Integrity
categories.focus: Required fields, valid relationships, data validation

categories.name: Security & FLS
categories.focus: User mode queries, field-level security awareness, no PII patterns

categories.name: Test Patterns
categories.focus: 201+ records for batch boundary testing, edge cases

categories.name: Cleanup & Isolation
categories.focus: Cleanup queries, rollback support, test isolation
